homepage.title: Prolo – Your Smart Logistics Partner in Saudi Arabia
homepage.description: Fast delivery, refrigerated transport, storage and fulfillment services across the Kingdom.

getAQuotePage.title: Get a Quote
getAQuotePage.description: Looking for reliable logistics support? Provide your details now and we’ll give you a tailored offer.

createShipmentPage.title: Create Shipment
createShipmentPage.description: Quickly and easily create your shipment with Prolo – secure and fast order processing.

trackingPage.title: Track Shipment
trackingPage.description: Enter your tracking number to check the status and current location of your order anytime.

contactPage.title: Talk to Us About Logistics
contactPage.description: Get in touch with the Prolo team for support, inquiries, or partnerships.

appDownload.title: Download Prolo App
appDownload.description: Download the Prolo app on Android or iOS for fast and reliable delivery services.

e-commerce-sector.title: E-Commerce Sector | Integrated Logistics Services for Online Stores
e-commerce-sector.description: Comprehensive logistics solutions (storage, shipping, delivery, returns management).

food-sector.title: Food Sector | Temperature-Controlled Logistics Solutions (Chilled, Frozen, Dry)
food-sector.description: Specialized logistics solutions for the food and beverage sector, including temperature-controlled storage and transport to ensure product safety and quality.

factories-and-goods-suppliers-sector.title: Factories & Goods Suppliers Sector | Industrial Supply Chain & Logistics Solutions
factories-and-goods-suppliers-sector.description: Integrated supply chain management for factories and suppliers, including industrial storage, transport, and operational leasing to support production.

hospitality-sector.title: Hospitality Sector | Specialized Logistics Services for Hospitality & Events
hospitality-sector.description: Comprehensive logistics services for hospitality, including hotels and large events, with temperature-controlled warehouses plus chilled and dry shipping.

notFound.title: Page Not Found | Error 404
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you’re looking for doesn’t exist. Return to the homepage for shipping quotes and logistics solutions for e-commerce.

bullet-delivery.title: Bullet Delivery Service | Ultra-Fast Delivery with Real-Time Tracking
bullet-delivery.description: Super-fast and reliable delivery (Bullet Delivery) with real-time tracking and quick execution for individuals and businesses in the Kingdom.

refrigerated-shipping.title: Refrigerated Shipping Service for Individuals | Safe Delivery of Temperature-Sensitive Products
refrigerated-shipping.description: Trusted refrigerated delivery that preserves the quality of temperature-sensitive products (food, medicine, flowers) within a fully monitored cold chain.

temporary-storage-solution.title: Temporary Storage Service | Secure, Flexible, Short-Term Storage Solutions
temporary-storage-solution.description: Flexible short-term storage solution that keeps your products safe in a monitored environment (temperature-controlled) with easy integration into shipping services.

last-mile.title: Last Mile Service | Integrated Delivery Solutions for Online Stores
last-mile.description: Comprehensive solutions for delivering e-commerce orders quickly and reliably to the customer’s door, with professional order management and fewer returns.

bullet-delivery.title: Bullet Delivery for Businesses | Ultra-Fast Delivery via Cloud Branches
bullet-delivery.description: Lightning-fast delivery (within 30 minutes – 4 hours) supported by strategically distributed cloud branches across the Kingdom to accelerate your store’s growth.

b2b-shipping.title: B2B Shipping Service | Reliable Transport for All Business Sizes
b2b-shipping.description: Trusted B2B shipping service with delivery schedules tailored to all sizes and types of goods (including chilled and dry) within the Kingdom.

storage-for-others.title: Third-Party Storage Service | Secure Warehousing & Precise Inventory Management
storage-for-others.description: Flexible and secure storage spaces for the commercial sector with full operation and precise inventory management (including frozen, chilled, and dry).

fulfillment-service.title: Fulfillment Service | Integrated Solution for Storage, Order Management & Shipping
fulfillment-service.description: Complete solution for product storage, inventory and order management, packing, and shipping for e-commerce stores in the Kingdom to reduce operational costs.

operational-leasing.title: Operational Leasing
operational-leasing.description: Logistics services including operational leasing with a full and diverse fleet, enabling flexible expansion without ownership.

refrigerated-shipping.title: Refrigerated Shipping for Businesses | Temperature-Controlled Transport for the Commercial Sector
refrigerated-shipping.description: Professional refrigerated transport solutions tailored for the commercial sector, ensuring top-level temperature control and product quality.

blogsPage.title: Prolo Blog | Latest Articles & Tips in Logistics and E-Commerce
blogsPage.description: Discover the latest Prolo blog articles covering advanced logistics topics, including express delivery, supply chains, inventory management, and secrets of e-commerce growth in Saudi Arabia.

how-express-delivery-impacts-ecommerce-g.title: How Express Delivery Impacts E-Commerce Growth | Prolo Logistics
how-express-delivery-impacts-ecommerce-g.description: Learn how express delivery improves customer experience, increases conversion rates, and boosts competitiveness for your online store in the Saudi market.

the-most-important-challenges-in-express.title: The Most Important Challenges in Express Delivery & How Companies Overcome Them | Logistics Solutions
the-most-important-challenges-in-express.description: Explore the key challenges in express delivery such as order congestion and last-mile issues, and how logistics companies provide solutions, including refrigerated shipping.

the-importance-of-frozen-storage-in-pres.title: The Importance of Frozen Storage in Preserving Sensitive Products | Cold Chain
the-importance-of-frozen-storage-in-pres.description: An in-depth look at the role of frozen storage in maintaining the safety of food and medicine, reducing waste, and building customer trust as a cornerstone of the cold supply chain.
